## Description
Add mobile-responsive design and Progressive Web App (PWA) capabilities.

## Features

### Mobile Optimization
- Fully responsive layouts for all screen sizes
- Touch-optimized UI elements
- Mobile-friendly navigation
- Optimized images and assets for mobile
- Fast loading on slower connections

### PWA Features
- Service worker for offline capability
- App manifest for "Add to Home Screen"
- Push notifications support
- Offline test taking (sync when online)
- App-like experience on mobile devices
- Background sync for saved answers

### Mobile-Specific Features
- Simplified mobile navigation
- Bottom navigation bar for mobile
- Swipe gestures for navigation
- Mobile camera integration for image questions
- Touch-friendly form inputs
- Reduced data usage mode

### Testing
- Test on various mobile devices
- Test on iOS and Android
- Verify PWA functionality
- Performance testing on mobile networks

## Priority
High

## Category
Feature - Mobile/PWA

## Labels
enhancement, feature, mobile, pwa, responsive
